TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_S’yux, title = S’yux, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/S’yux} }

S.FORM: S'yux Itiniay i Heping Cen no Taichung ko S'yux a niyaro', 99 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 280 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 73% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 204 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 27% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 76 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal69%, Amis1%, Bunun3%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

S'yox Itiniay i Heping Cen no Taichong ko S'yox a niyaro', 99 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 280 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 73% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 204 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 27% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 76 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal69%, Amis1%, Bonon3%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
